source(output(
		EmployeeGUID as string,
		CenterID as integer,
		TrainingExerciseID as integer,
		ResourceID as integer,
		SalutationID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		EmployeeInitials as string,
		UserLogin as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		City as string,
		StateID as integer,
		PostalCode as string,
		PhoneMain as string,
		PhoneAlternate as string,
		EmergencyContact as string,
		PayrollNumber as string,
		TimeClockNumber as string,
		LastLogin as timestamp,
		IsSchedulerViewOnlyFlag as boolean,
		EmployeeFullNameCalc as string,
		IsActiveFlag as boolean,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary,
		AbbreviatedNameCalc as string,
		ActiveDirectorySID as binary,
		EmployeePayrollID as string,
		EmployeeTitleID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> CNCTEmployee
ODSSFUser filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1)) ~> FilterLastModified
FilterLastModified select(mapColumn(
		UserId = Id,
		UserLogin = Username,
		UserName = Name,
		CompanyName,
		Street,
		City,
		State,
		IsActive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(SourceSystem = 'Salesforce',
		DWH_LoadDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> CustomColumns
CustomColumns derive(Hash = sha2(256, concat(UserId,SourceSystem))) ~> AddHash
CNCTEmployee filter((toDate(LastUpdate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastUpdate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1)) || (toDate(CreateDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(CreateDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1))) ~> FilterByLastUpdated
FilterByLastUpdated select(mapColumn(
		UserId = EmployeeGUID,
		CenterID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		UserLogin,
		Street = Address1,
		City,
		State = StateID,
		IsActive = IsActiveFlag,
		CreateDate,
		LastUpdate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectEmployeeColumns
SelectEmployeeColumns derive(UserName = FirstName + ' ' + LastName,
		SourceSystem = 'cONEct',
		DWH_LoadDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp(),
		State = toString(State)) ~> CustomColumnEmployee
CustomColumnEmployee derive(Hash = sha2(256, concat(UserId,SourceSystem))) ~> AddHashEmployee
AddHash, AddHashEmployee union(byName: true)~> Union
Union alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert
AllowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		UserKey as integer,
		UserId as string,
		UserLogin as string,
		UserName as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		Street as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		TeamName as string,
		cONEctUserLogin as string,
		cONEctGUID as string,
		CenterId as string,
		Hash as string,
		DWH_LoadDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SourceSystem as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UserId'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		UserId,
		UserLogin,
		UserName,
		CompanyName,
		Street,
		City,
		State,
		Hash,
		DWH_LoadDate,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		IsActive,
		CenterId = CenterID,
		SourceSystem
	)) ~> InsertIntoSystemUser

		ResultName as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SourceSystem as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceDimResult
ODSTask filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1)) ~> FilterLastModified
FilterLastModified select(mapColumn(
		Result__c
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectResult
SelectResult aggregate(groupBy(Result__c),
	each(match(name!='Result__c'), $$ = first($$))) ~> SelectDistinctResult
SelectDistinctResult filter(!isNull(Result__c)) ~> FilterNull
FilterNull derive(ResultHash = sha2(256, lower(Result__c)),
		ResultName = lower(Result__c),
		IsActive = toBoolean('1'),
		SourceSystem = 'Salesforce') ~> AddCustomColumns
AddCustomColumns, SelectDimResultHash exists(AddCustomColumns@ResultHash == SelectDimResultHash@ResultHash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesNotExists
AddCustomColumns, SelectDimResultHash exists(AddCustomColumns@ResultHash == SelectDimResultHash@ResultHash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
SourceDimResult select(mapColumn(
		ResultHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimResultHash
Exists derive(DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddDateColumn
AddDateColumn alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AllowUpdate
DoesNotExists derive(DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LoadDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddDatesColumns

	)) ~> UpdateDimResult

	)) ~> InsertDimResult

FilterByLastModified select(mapColumn(
		FactDate = CreatedDate,
		Id,
		AppointmentDate = SchedStartTime,
		AccountId,
		ContactId,
		ParentRecordType,
		ParentRecordId,
		WorkTypeId,
		AccountCity = City,
		AccountState = State,
		AccountPostalCode = PostalCode,
		AccountCountry = Country,
		AppointmentDescription = Description,
		AppointmentStatus = Status,
		ServiceTerritoryId,
		AppointmentType,
		AppointmentCenterType = Center_Type__c,
		ExternalId = External_Id__c,
		ServiceAppointment = Service_Appointment__c,
		MeetingPlatform = Meeting_Platform__c,
		MeetingPlatformId = Meeting_Platform_Id__c,
		IsDeleted,
		AppointmentStatusCategory = StatusCategory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAppointmentColumns
DimDate select(mapColumn(
		FactDateKey = DateKey,
		DimFactDate = FullDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFactDatecolumns
DimDate select(mapColumn(
		AppointmentDateKey = DateKey,
		DimAppointmentDate = FullDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAppointmentDateColumns
SelectAppointmentColumns, SelectFactDatecolumns join(toDate(FactDate) == DimFactDate,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFactDate
JoinFactDate, SelectAppointmentDateColumns join(toDate(AppointmentDate) == DimAppointmentDate,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAppointmentDate
DimTimeOfDay select(mapColumn(
		FactTimeKey = TimeOfDayKey,
		HourFactDate = Hour24,
		MinuteFactDate = Minute,
		SecondFactDate = Second
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTimeFactDate
DimTimeOfDay select(mapColumn(
		AppointmentTimeKey = TimeOfDayKey,
		HourAppointment = Hour24,
		MinuteAppointment = Minute,
		SecondAppointment = Second
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTimeAppointment
JoinAppointmentDate, SelectTimeFactDate join(hour(FactDate) == HourFactDate
	&& minute(FactDate) == MinuteFactDate
	&& second(FactDate) == SecondFactDate,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTimeFactDate
JoinTimeFactDate, SelectTimeAppointment join(hour(AppointmentDate) == HourAppointment
	&& minute(AppointmentDate) == MinuteAppointment
	&& second(AppointmentDate) == SecondAppointment,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTimeAppointment
JoinTimeAppointment, SelectGeographyColumns join(lower(iif(length(replace(AccountPostalCode, ' ',''))==6, left(AccountPostalCode, 3), AccountPostalCode)) == DigitZIPCode,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimGeography
DimGeography select(mapColumn(
		GeographyKey,
		DigitZIPCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGeographyColumns
DimAppointmentType filter(SourceSystem == 'Salesforce') ~> FilterAppoimentTypeSourceSystem
FilterAppoimentTypeSourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		AppointmentTypeKey,
		AppointmentTypeName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAppointmentTypeColumns
JoinDimGeography, SelectAppointmentTypeColumns join(lower(trim(AppointmentType)) == lower(AppointmentTypeName),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAppointmentType
JoinAppointmentType, SelectMeetingPlatform join(lower(MeetingPlatform) == lower(MeetingPlatformName),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMeetingPlatform
DimMeetingPlatform filter(SourceSystem == 'Salesforce') ~> FilterMeetingPlatform
FilterMeetingPlatform select(mapColumn(
		MeetingPlatformKey,
		MeetingPlatformName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMeetingPlatform
AddCustomColumnsAndKeys alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert
JoinFactLead derive(FactTimeKey = coalesce(FactTimeKey, -1),
		FactDateKey = coalesce(FactDateKey, -1),
		AppointmentTimeKey = coalesce(AppointmentTimeKey, -1),
		AppointmentDateKey = coalesce(AppointmentDateKey, -1),
		AccountKey = coalesce(AccountKey, -1),
		ContactKey = coalesce(-1),
		GeographyKey = coalesce(GeographyKey, -1),
		AppointmentTypeKey = coalesce(AppointmentTimeKey, -1),
		MeetingPlatformKey = coalesce(MeetingPlatformKey, -1),
		WorkTypeKey = coalesce(-1),
		Statuskey = coalesce(StatusKey, -1),
		DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LoadDate = currentTimestamp(),
		IsOld = 0,
		LeadId = coalesce(LeadId, LeadIdOld, LeadIdParent, LeadIdFact),
		LeadKey = coalesce(LeadKey, LeadKeyOld, LeadKeyParent,LeadKeyFact,-1),
		CenterKey = coalesce(CenterKeyLast, CenterKey, CenterKeyParent, -1),
		CenterNumber = coalesce(CenterNumberLast, toInteger(CenterKeyParent), toInteger(CenterNumber)),
		OpportunityAmmount = coalesce(Amount, Ammount__c)) ~> AddCustomColumnsAndKeys
JoinMeetingPlatform, SelectAccountColumns join(SelectAppointmentColumns@AccountId == SelectAccountColumns@AccountId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimAccount
DimAccount filter(SourceSystem == 'Salesforce') ~> FilterAccountSourceSystem
FilterAccountSourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		AccountKey,
		AccountId,
		AccountExternalId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAccountColumns
DimStatus filter(lower(StatusGroup) == lower('ServiceAppointment')) ~> FilterByStatusGroup
FilterByStatusGroup select(mapColumn(
		StatusKey,
		Hash,
		StatusName,
		StatusGroup,
		DWH_LoadDate,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		IsActive,
		SourceSystem
	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStatusName
JoinDimAccount, SelectStatusName join(lower(trim(AppointmentStatus)) == lower(trim(StatusName)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStatus
DimLead select(mapColumn(

		LeadId,
		ConvertedAccountId,
		CenterKey,
		CenterNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimLead
JoinStatus, SelectDimLeadCustom join(SelectAppointmentColumns@AccountId == ConvertedAccountId
	&& AccountKey == ControlColumn,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimLead
DimLead select(mapColumn(
		LeadIdOld = LeadId,
		LeadKeyOld = LeadKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimLeadOld
JoinDimLead, SelectDimLeadOld join(case(isNull(LeadId),AccountExternalId) == LeadIdOld,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimLeadOld
JoinDimLeadOld, SelectLeadBYPArentRecord join(ParentRecordId == LeadIdParent,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimLeadParentRecord
DimLead select(mapColumn(
		LeadKeyParent = LeadKey,
		LeadIdParent = LeadId,
		CenterKeyParent = CenterKey,
		CenterNumberParent = CenterNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLeadBYPArentRecord
FilterCenter select(mapColumn(
		CenterKeyLast = CenterKey,
		CenterNumberLast = CenterNumber,
		ServiceTerritoryIdLast = ServiceTerritoryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
